Name: the Arena Gladiators
Description: On Westerhand, desperate MechWarrior gladiators fight for money and renown, aiming to secure contracts. The arenas, kept alive by struggling mercenaries and aspiring warriors who can't afford the trip to Solaris, are run-down and bleak. The battles are brutal, deadly, and short, reflecting the fighters' desperation and the dilapidated state of their equipment.
